headline: SunPower’s Kapil Rai Named EVP of New Homes Division
summary: Period of Transformational GrowthOREM, Utah, Feb. 11, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- SunPower Inc. (herein “SunPower,” the “Company,” or Nasdaq: “SPWR”) a solar technology, services, and installation company, today announced the promotion of Kapil Rai to be EVP of the New Homes division, which also includes the Multifamily and Light Commercial (C&I) segments. His mandate is to strengthen partnerships with builders, installation partners, financing companies, OEM suppliers, and customers nationwide. Ka

headline: Truist Securities Maintains Hold on Microchip Technology, Raises Price Target to $69
summary: Truist Securities  analyst William Stein   maintains Microchip Technology (NASDAQ:MCHP) with a Hold and raises the price target from $68 to $69.

headline: Assessing Microchip Technology (MCHP) Valuation After Edge AI Expansion And US$800 Million Convertible Notes Offering
summary: Microchip Technology (MCHP) has extended its edge AI platform with full stack solutions for its microcontrollers and microprocessors, and has also completed an $800 million convertible senior notes offering due 2030 that increases its financial flexibility. See our latest analysis for Microchip Technology. Microchip shares have picked up momentum recently, with a 1 day share price return of 3.29% and a 90 day share price return of 38.16% at US$76.86.
